يعطيه في هذين الشّهرين سدس دينر لكل شهر درهمين

Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
[Ce]ci est ce qu’a pris en louage Saʿīd Ibn ʿĪsā: Il a pris en louage Hārūn ibn Bqām, [Th]is is what Saʿîd b. ʿÎsâ has hired for wages: he has hired Hârûn b. Bqâm;
[Sa]ʿîd b. ʿÎsâ has hired him for two full months that he might do the work connected with the (broad) beans on condition that he would [Sa]ʿīd Ibn ʿĪsā l’a pris en louage pour deux mois entiers, afin qu’il acconplisse pour lui le travail des fèves et à condition que (Saʿīd)
give him (as his hire) for these two months the sixth of a dînâr, for each month two dirhams, give him (as his wages) for these two months the sixth of a dînâr, for each month two dirhams, lui donne pour ces deux mois un sixième de dīnār, chaque mois deux drachmes.
and the first day of the month is (reckoned from) the first day of Choiak of the months of the Copts Et le premier jour du mois est le premier jour de khoiak, (l’un) des mois des non arabes
de l’année deux cent vingt-sept. Ont témoigné de cela of the year two hundred and twenty six. (The following witnesses) have testified to it:
And Ayyûb b. Mûsâ, who has written his testimony in the beginning of the 5th indiction of the year 227. And Ayyûb b. Mûsâ, who has written his testimony in the year 227. {et} Ayyūb Ibn Mūsā, et il écrivit son témoignage en l’an 227,
And Muḥammad b. Aṯwab, who has written (it) in[his]own handwriting. et Muḥammad Ibn Aṯwab, et il écrivit de [sa] main
et Walīd Ibn Muslim alQuraši, et il écrivit son témoignage de sa main. Walîd b. Muslim, the Qorašite, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
